name <- c("Adeshina", "Brendan", "Jayden", "Kylie", "Nora", "Gia", "Aston", "Marshawn", "Jemilah", "Guy", "Alaiya", "Aymir", "Jourdan", "Anhala", "Ameerah", "Michael", "Jallbe", "Aâ€™Zyiah", "Amira", "Keiano", "Mylah", "Tristan", "Rhegan", "Ariana", "Aubrelle")

  c("M", "M", "M", "F", "F", "F", "M", "M", "F", "M", "F", "M", "F", "F", "F", "M", "M", "F", "F", "M", "F", "M", "F", "F", "F")

  c(16, 21, NA, NA, NA, 22, NA, 12, NA, 17, 21, 23, 12, 19, 17, 10, 19, 15, 16, 19, 10, 13, 19, 14, 20)

            sex = sex,

  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("domain"),
               names_to = "score")

# Visualizations
```{r}
d |>
  group_by(name) |>
  mutate(color_flag = ifelse(value[2] > value[1], "darkgreen", "red"),
         order = row_number()) |>
  ungroup() |>
  ggplot(aes(x = value, y = name, group = name, color = color_flag)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_text(aes(label = order), size = 3) +
  scale_color_identity() +
  theme_bw()
```
